summary: This document is a series of official Bureau of Prisons count sheets from the New York Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) dated August 10, 2019. It records inmate population counts by housing unit area at specific times, including a 1:20 AM count and a 12:35 AM count. The document is significant as it provides a snapshot of the facility's population on the night Jeffrey Epstein died.

events.title: Inmate Population Counts at NY MCC
events.description: Official inmate counts were conducted at the New York Metropolitan Correctional Center at 00:35:17 (12:35 AM) and 01:20:48 (1:20 AM). The total census was recorded as 758 inmates, with a verified count of 754.

keyFacts: The document is dated August 10, 2019, the night Jeffrey Epstein died in custody.
It shows inmate population counts at the New York MCC at approximately 12:35 AM and 1:20 AM.
The total inmate census recorded was 758, with a verified count of 754.
The document is an official Bureau of Prisons count sheet, a routine administrative record.
No specific inmates or staff are named in the provided text excerpts.
